author: arkurth
msg: Made several changes to Linux.pm to allow the various Linux OS commands to work under ESXi via SSH. There are several commands which aren't available under ESXi such as du. The commands which are supported usually allow only basic arguments and switches.

author: boisvert
msg: BUILDR-482 Javadoc: cannot load class java.com.sun.tools.javadoc.Main

author: gdusbabek
msg: outbound tcp connections were never being shutdown properly, causing occasional dropped messages. patch by gdusbabek, reviewed by jbellis. CASSANDRA-1221
